title: Need help, TOXIC
body:
My first acc was Gold 3 got banned last 5 months ago ( Got banned for "Exploits" or some bull idec ) Anyways in that acc i had been chat restricted 3 times Don't know how many games too lazy to remember,  This acc i just got a 2 week suspension cause i called out a gnar on the mistakes that he made and some shit were taking out of context if you wanna see chat like comment and subscribe....jk just ask, anyways i wanna know some ways of reforming. No i'm not gonna mute my chat cause what is a team game without communication...dumbass riot... and sure muting all chat but lets be honest, I'm gold elo the people who tilt you most is yourself, and the people who tilt you second most is your fucking team mates..so muting all chat is not a fucking solution K? So anyone got some tips that would be great, if you are one of those " OH SO GLAD I SEE RIOT IS BANNING TOXIC PLAYERS LIKE YOU HAHA" Yea you, take your whiny ass out to the oven and stay there, cause you my friend are a silly fucking sausage and you deserve to get burn. I'm sure like 20% of you guys reading this actually have shit in mind for solutions, the rest of that 80% gtfo i don't need your shitty comment about how i deserve it, you are the reason Tilt exist you silly sausage




PCE

replies.body: Idk maybe stop being a c**t ?

Yea real smart buddy, it's like someone asking you why they have cancer and how they can live through it to not have cancer



Jimmy : " I have cancer, how can i cure it "
Knuuckles: " Idk, maybe try not having cancer? "

You idiot

No it isn't. If you are toxic and can't stop going on to your team / flaming them, that is your fault. Don't even try to make a comparison. Riot punishes you for been so goddamn annoying, they aren't gonna put you through a rehab program how about you just stop been a jerk?

Several people I love die from cancer, and I'm sure it is the same for you. They didn't choose to have cancer, you choose to be a butthurt moron in games.

And btw, I have "/mute all" on every single game I play, and if I'm playing ranked with friends I will at least have "/mute enemy" on. It doesn't restrict communication, because 1. The new pings pretty much cover everything a player could do, and 2. If you are toxic the majority of what you type isn't communication.

It isn't Riot's job to reform for you, you need to reform or you can keep getting banned.

And yes I am aware that to you it seems unfair because other people in your game probably do the same thing or intent feed or worse, but I can tell you first person that those people need to stop getting so triggered over a random, and that is basically the whole "he started it" approach.

If I may quote you call people who think you deserved to be banned "whiny bitch asses" and say that they are "the reason why tilt exists".

Nope, not even close. You are the one getting banned for been said thing in games, not them. You are the person tilting people in games, not them.

Let me correct you on something real quick sir I don't call those who say i deserve to be ban the reason tilt exist. I call people who be a dick about everything they see wrong the reason tilt exist. Oh did i die cause i tried to save your ass from being killed? Don't tell me "You should have stayed in lane now you died and gave my lane a kill" Thats the type, those who point out why i deserve on the other hand are cool. There is a difference between Helpful criticism and straight up being a dick and lets be honest this is the league community, more than 50% claim to be of older age than they are so they can make some shitty mum joke and are ironically the straight up dicks i'm referring to. Secondly, if you had read what i said, Enemies don't tilt me, My team mates does, whether they spam pings when i missed something spam pings when i die or even worst literally point out every mistakes i did that game like bitch sit your ass down your 3/6 isn't helping the situation by spamming me pings. 3 even when i go aggressive on someone more than half of the shit i say in chat are useful info, if it be the ss of my laner, ss of the jg or ss of bot lane when i go around and roam. and i don't mute all chat cause i need to see what my jg wants to do as half the games i play the jg is usually the shot caller. and i'm the person tilting people? Bitch where? I ain't the one spamming pings and blamming the jg for not ganking 24/7 cause the enemies jg been bot 30 days in an hour. I'm not the one blaming the mid laner to roam cause i lost lane and i sure as hell don't type in all chat unless i have a shit joke that i want everyone to cringe at. When i see a flame in chat i tell them to sit their asses down and play the game but no, this community seems to have more younger audiences that the fucking teletubies that instead of listening and agree to disagree they agree to disagree on the agreement of disagreeing. And let me get back on that ping system, why the hell would i need to know my team mates ss when i can see that shit on the score board, I'm in gold elo i have already pretty much memorised al the ss and i'm pretty sure having to know the enemy ss so i can time in for when i roam or get ganked is way more important than knowing what i already have info to.  Oh and i didn't know the gnar telling lies in all chat about how i instalocked in all chat and called him a kunt pre game in champ select because i didn't roam to his lane when he was 0/4 was my fault. Pls explain. and stop being a jerk?? I'm not the one telling others to commit suicide over a game i get mad at or telling them they are adopted and saying that they were never loved by their parents. If all it takes is 1 bad game to get 2 weeks ban then i sure as hell shouldn't see why people who Int, Feed, Or tell people to "get ball cancer so they have an excuse to commit suicide because no one loved you anyways" Should have a waaaaaaaay worst punishment than i do. And butthurt? Since someone clearly died of cancer in your family 
( No disrespect ) wouldn't you also be butthurt? I mean you already are since you wrote like an essay full of stuff about me comparing this with cancer. Also what does a bronze know about avoiding toxicity, 80% Make up the toxic community on league anyways.

Alright I skipped most of what you said because you haven't given me any context prior to now and expect me to know the circumstances. Yes, I do get mad at them, but I don't flame them in chat, there is a difference.

And if you are just gonna use bronze rank as a way to disprove me, you actually gave reason as to why I am experienced enough to know what I am talking about. I play with a lot of toxic players, so I think I know how they work.

Get triggered m8.

Yea and that's the problem lol and by brining up your rank isn't a way to disprove you, it was a way to show that that it's your rank thats the most toxic and that should not be something to be proud of, not 1 bit, and the fact that you know how they work just shows how much mechanical skin you have compared to game knowledge, i may be come off as toxic to some but at least i made it to gold 



Take the trigger back, You might need it :)

You don't make any sense, first of all no I'm not "proud of my rank", I'm not so insecure that I need to go around comparing ranks to make myself feel better than a percentage. I don't want to get into another argument about golds calling bronzes trash when it is a completely unrelated topic.

You admitted you are toxic and made a stupid post because you can't be bothered reforming? By "mechanical skin" I'm assuming you meant to say skill.

Yes you are right, my game knowledge is very high but I am not mechanically skilled. Gold is an achievement, I've been to Gold 1 once, but that was when OCE was new and everyone sucked.

Ranks aren't the topic of this conversation, and I don't need to bust out my ego not only in rank but in game when you apparently flame people.

By the looks of it you are a mid lane main, which is very mechanically intensive to play, unless this is a friends account or your smurf, which I am assuming it is a smurf based on the match history and it been unranked.

You play a lot of games on that account, what is your main then?

And as for your comment suggesting I should shoot my self, you could've just moved on and not said that, but because you did you now contradict yourself when trying to say "I may come off as toxic to some". No, you are toxic, this conversation has nothing to do with ranks or skill, it has to do with attitude.

You talk so much s*** down to me but if a diamond or higher came along and started calling you trash for your rank when the conversation was unrelated you would shut up.

See that's my problem right there... i don't know how to avoid shit like this... yea i am contradicting i've been told that a lot but i don't know how to stop it... every time i see something to argue about i just go in and i can't seem to stop myself i apologies for the filthy remarks i made and/or will make i just don't know how to stop and what to do to stop i know the last guy below said " No matter what anyone does to you you still have a choice in how to respond and to say you don't is ignorance " It's just so annoying how i have to back down against someone especially when after backing down, they will feel like they shut you up and it almost seem like you lost the argument trying to be the bigger person but ending up the bottom end
^ This is why i started this post i don't care about your rank, rank doesn't show how good you are as a person, look at me i'm in gold and i'm toxic

Tbh I've spent the majority of my League career expecting good results and getting upset when I don't get it because I know I'm better than my "rank". Finally after so many slumps and beat downs I'm starting to realize I'm not enjoying the game because of my focus on results. I'm playing games now trying to find holes in my game so I can analyze it and improve. So far it's helped. Getting out of bronze is another ball game but I'm hopeful for the future.

3 tips off getting out of Bronze and how i kinda got to gold,

1. Pick champs that Bronze players love to whine about and tilt them by either playing aggro or just straight up farm for 20 min

2. look for rotation. From what i've seen bronze players don't really know how to rotate properly so make sure to see an opportunity to push lanes out. And find out the diff between slow pushing a lane and straight up just shoving it 

3. Don't care about team comps, it's bronze half the people don't even know team comp exists, Played against a garen top as diana and he built a Sunfire cape into me rofl, Pick your best champ and just keep playing, Just stay in lane and shove turret, If you are an adc player tell your support to roam to other lanes at 20 min if you are winning lane and stay bot and push, Mid lane? Just sit mid and push but make sure your jg has your back or you have vision. Top lane? I mean thats your job make sure to take TP tho and support? Just stick to your adc till you see that they can 2v1 reliably by themselves and then roam. Jg? Make sure to have drag + Tower control. Here are the objective importance in order 

Nexus > Inhib >Baron > Tower > Dragon > Kills 

That's kinda the guidelines i personally use to get to Gold

Don't worry, I understand getting mad and feeling the need to completely destroy what they are saying when someone says something that pisses you off. You just need to realize that whether in game or out, what randoms on the internet say isn't worth getting mad about.

We may not agree here, but I am telling you that you need to realize most of the people making you "toxic" are angry teens who abuse their anonymity in order to find an out source.

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kF87XjqF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-15T08:57:30.159+0000)
>
> Idk maybe stop being a c**t ?

https://65.media.tumblr.com/3d1bff71db9fff85861e14c745792061/tumblr_n99owvCBXz1sgl0ajo1_250.gif

... if u actually quit being toxic and take a min to realise u can make more than one account on 1 email 

Jesus Christ i hate this elo
You're lv 25?? and what does making accounts on 1 email have to do with "This elo" and me trying to not be toxic... Try to stay on topic bro
btw DotA 3 is not coming until a couple of years
yea i am summoners rift elo bronze but nvm i hate staying on topic {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

There is no quick easy one step solution. Think about all the bad deeds you have done in you're entire league career (for example). Then double that with good deeds. Then you're some what back to neutral ground. The good and bad deeds can't be measured though right? because you haven't sat there with you're diary taking note of everything you have done and said. Therefor all you do is take it comment by comment, game by game, and just be supportive of people. Help them with questions. Who really knows how many possibilities there are you could do. Just as long as it's something that's productive for the community. Also, make it something you enjoy doing. If you do something just because you want something out of it you will eventually get found out for it and when you do you will end up back at square one. So if you're going to do it you may as well do it for you and not any other reason.

So i can punish for the 20% of the games i am toxic and tired as hell in but not recognised by the 80% of games i out this " ^_^" or this " : ^)"
Or even this " Gw guys one more team fight like that and we win gg :3" LOL yea great logic, i get that in general being nice is something of social standards, but if it is "Social Standards" They why the hell is that looked up upon? You get looked up upon for doing something you should do? And yea 20% of the games i am toxic big fucking deal not like i was the one starting all this shit i get dragged into it. And i do wanna reform so sick of calling someone a retard after they call me a kunt. wtf am i suppose to do when someone is toxic? Mute them? Thats a sign of weakness. Makes it seem like they have the last laugh and i hate being on the loosing end such bs. and what if there is an actual troll inting in my game huh? Played jg had a lag spike cause servers of my internet provider were down then i get blamed when the duo bot looses lane and had the shit to say " Lag or not you are shit at jg kys " Like what? Hello i didn't even say anything all i said was " No ganks for a while my internet is a bit laggy atm" And they don't get ban for committing a real life threat but i can banned for telling them to not be so retarded when they say gg in all chat and just run down mid? Yea seems legit

Mate, I really can't tell if you're new to social standards or not but seems like you're arguing in the wrong place with the wrong people to make a point that really has no relevance here. You're topic suggests you need help but seems like more of a rant trying to justify behavior.

Was just trying to prove a point and i clearly did a bad job at it... You say to just stay positive but what if you get provoked? what do you do then. Most of the games i was toxic in wasn't by choice of " This game i'm gonna be an asshole " i was provoked by someone to do something, yea i know muting them is 1 thing but is there any other way. As i said i do try to stay positive if my team ff i say we can win this we just need to this this and this and someone types i'm done fuck this and afks how can i not get mad at that It's not like i want to be toxic i have been nice for like 2 months and then 1 bad person in a team i happen to be the same of and BOOM 2 weeks it just seems a bit like insult to injury

I get what you're saying and maybe I have misunderstood but, being provoked only gets you so far in reality. You have to remember at the end of the day no matter how unfair or threatened you feel (for example) really has no effect on the fact that you're 100% responsible for how you act in return. No matter what anyone does to you you still have a choice in how to respond and to say you don't is ignorance. I'm not trying to make light of you're situation because I have no idea of you're situation but what I'm trying to say is you need to liberate yourself out of the mind set that just because you're environment and or the people are around are one way, in no way shape or form justifies you to follow suit.

I will keep this words in mind " No matter what anyone does to you you still have a choice in how to respond and to say you don't is ignorance"  after i get unbanned and see how it goes Thanks for the advice ^-^
Any time mate. Hope it helps and good luck!

I'm just a guy who wants to earn more IP so i can get some champs so i can get back to playing ranked and get back to gold just like i was but no i need some dickheads telling me and everyone in all chat i'm boosted and i need to go suck my dad's dick. That's like that 1 kid in class and the teacher is riot, That kid ain't no getting into any trouble but you sure are cause fuck me seems like i'm the bad guy for calling jimmy a stupid cunt after he throws me into the fucking dumpster seems like i'm fucking toxic WOOPTIFUCKINGDOO
